numbered_ace_sentences: 1. My name is Pedro.
2. I am 14 years old.
3. I write this comment for a school project.
4. I share my opinion.
5. I do not notice many surprising things.
6. My mother wants to move to Florida.
7. I cannot move to Florida now.
8. I cannot move to Florida partly because of past memories.
9. I need to stay with my grandparents.
10. In the future, my grandparents will be gone.
11. After that, I will go to Florida.
12. I want to be with my father figure in Florida.
13. The distance between me and my mother is about 3000 miles.
14. Because of this distance, I cannot call my mother all the time.
15. Because of this distance, I cannot visit my mother all the time.
16. This situation relates to my community.
17. This situation may be a reason for depression.
18. Parents are a huge part of life.
19. A person should call the parents every day.
20. A person should say to the parents that the person loves the parents.
21. Life is fast.
22. The headline is: The parental extinction is among us.
23. The parental extinction starts with cutting communication.
